ygData.subject: Re: Lanys T'yvl...
ygData.msgSnippet: Let me guess... you play a female human/wood-elf/half-elf/dark-elf char?? I play on Xev, Sullon Zek and now Firiona Vie, 2 or the 3 of which are pretty darn
ygData.messageBody:
Let me guess... you play a female
human/wood-elf/half-elf/dark-elf char?? I play on Xev, Sullon Zek and now Firiona
Vie, 2 or the 3 of which are pretty darn friendly--
BUT i've never just been handed plat, at least to the
tune of 120pp, at lower levels. BUT I hear that lonely
and sad males controling much larger, stronger, more
intelligent and better looking "avatars" will often fling
money and items to female chars... for what reason? I'm
not sure, but i'll bet the same people aren't giving
plats to male gnomes!!! Too funny...<br><br>Xela
Orcbane<br>Druid of the 36th Season<br>Xev<br><br>Rumble<br>Rogue
of the 16th Station<br>FV<br><br>Dyrtee<br>Shammy of
the 4th sickness<br>SZ
